concept.title: Title pane touch observer API
concept.shortdesc: The Title pane touch observer API is used for observing when the title pane has been tapped.

conbody.p: For user experience guidelines on the title pane, see the title pane UI component description.
For implementation information, see Setting the title pane touch pane observer.
For Title pane touch observer API classes and header files, see Classes and Definitions.

section.title: Constraints
section.p: This API is valid for touch-enabled Symbian platforms.

section.title: Emulator support
section.p: This API is fully supported in the WINS/WINSCW emulator environment.
